NAME: Textiles
DESCRIPTION: Handwoven and handcrafted textiles including sarees, shawls, and fabrics.

NAME: Pottery
DESCRIPTION: Traditional pottery and ceramics from various regions of India.

NAME: Woodwork
DESCRIPTION: Handcrafted wooden items including furniture, toys, and decorative pieces.

NAME: Metalwork
DESCRIPTION: Metal crafts including brass, copper, and bronze items.

NAME: Jewelry
DESCRIPTION: Traditional and contemporary jewelry made with various materials.

NAME: Paintings
DESCRIPTION: Traditional art forms including Madhubani, Warli, and Pattachitra.
